Name: Heavy Lifter
Description: Can wear heavy armor with less penalty.

Name: Immovable
Description: Cannot be knocked back or staggered.

Name: Titan's Grip
Description: Can wield Two-Handed weapons in one hand.

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Survive fatal damage once per combat (1HP).

Name: Parry King
Description: Doubles the timing window for parries.

Name: Riposte
Description: Next hit after Parry is 100% Crit.

Name: Disarm
Description: Chance to knock weapon from enemy hand.

Name: Smart Fighter
Description: Add 50% of INT to Melee Damage.

Name: Feint
Description: Attacks have 25% chance to ignore shields.

Name: Bleed Out
Description: Bleed effects can stack infinite times.

Name: Flash Step
Description: Dodge roll becomes an instant teleport.

Name: Calculated
Description: Add 100% of INT to Stealth Skill.

Name: Ghost
Description: Enemies take 2x longer to spot you.

Name: Execution
Description: Sneak attack on non-boss is instant kill.

Name: Void Walker
Description: Stealth does not break when moving fast.

Name: Ballistics
Description: Add 50% of INT to Ranged Damage.

Name: Jury Rig
Description: Can use items at 0 Durability (50% stats).

Name: Turret Ops
Description: Can hack and control hostile turrets.

Name: Exo-Pilot
Description: Use INT instead of STR for Heavy Armor req.

Name: Bot Master
Description: Can have an additional active drone.

Name: Cybernetics
Description: Stats from Gear can exceed racial caps.

Name: Rumor Mill
Description: Taverns reveal map locations for free.

Name: Silver Tongue
Description: Can retry failed Persuasion checks once.

Name: Entourage
Description: Can recruit a generic NPC guard.

Name: Blackmail
Description: Bribing costs 0 if you have 'Intel' items.

Name: Cultist
Description: Can recruit hostile human mobs (low HP).

Name: Pacifist
Description: Gain Combat XP for resolving peacefully.

Name: Merchant
Description: Can access shop menu from anywhere.

Name: Blood Magic
Description: Spend HP to cast spells if Mana empty.

Name: Necro
Description: Dead enemies rise as temp allies.

Name: Ambusher
Description: First attack in any combat is Crit.

Name: Primal
Description: Add 20% of VIT to Melee Damage.

Name: Diagnosis
Description: See exact HP numbers of enemies.

Name: Combat Med
Description: Can drag downed allies/bodies at full speed.

Name: Stim Freak
Description: Immune to drug addiction side effects.

Name: Miracle
Description: Action: Bring a dead ally back to life.

Name: Salvage
Description: Get more materials when destroying items.

Name: Socketing
Description: Can add 1 Gem Slot to any armor.

Name: Reforge
Description: Action: Reroll random stats on gear.

Name: Metallurgy
Description: Can combine metals for lighter/stronger gear.

Name: Heist
Description: Alarms/Traps do not trigger for you.

Name: Guildmaster
Description: Unlock global bank access from inventory.

Name: Transmute
Description: Action: Turn Lead Ore into Gold Ore.

Name: Mad Science
Description: Mix two potions into one bottle.
